title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Skills: Designing Math Concept Learning Using Virtual Classrooms: Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational arithmetic skills and basic geometric shape recognition
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can perform fraction operations with over 80% accuracy through two video formats (PPT/lightboard) produced in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can apply cognitive load theory (intrinsic/extraneous/germane) to independently select suitable video-based learning strategies.
Learners can reconstruct math concepts acquired through video learning with over 70% accuracy in an assessment conducted three months later.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
